title: Close-up of claimed Huawei Nexus 6 revealed in video leak | Trusted Reviews
description:
![Huawei Nexus
6](https://ksassets.timeincuk.net/wp/uploads/sites/54/2017/07/trusted-reviews-
placeholder-3.svg)

**Huawei has long been rumoured to be one of the manufacturers working on the
next round of Nexus devices.**

Lending credence to that theory is a new video that purports to show the
unconfirmed Huawei Nexus 6.

The video, which was posted to Twitter by prolific – and oft-reliable –
rumour-spinner [OnLeaks](https://twitter.com/OnLeaks), displays a mysterious
black handset up close.

Check it out:

(YouTube)-8qdsWHHijA(/YouTube)

What’s more, the video appears to show that the device has a fingerprint
scanner positioned below the camera.

That supports earlier theories that the Nexus 6 will carry a biometric scanner
for improved security.

enable it")

  * 

Back at this year’s [I/O developer
conference](https://www.trustedreviews.com/opinions/google-i-o-what-to-
expect), Google revealed that its upcoming [Android
M](https://www.trustedreviews.com/opinions/android-m-features) would focus
heavily on fingerprint authentication.

As such, it would make sense that the company’s flagship smartphones, which
will likely debut with Android M on board, will feature fingerprint scanners.

It’s also worth noting that the handset in the video appears to be quite
large, which matches rumours that Huawei is building a 5.7in device for
Google’s Nexus program.  
 **  
Related:[Best Android Smartphones 2015](https://www.trustedreviews.com/best-
android-phones-1_round-up)**

We should also mention that Google has just confirmed LG as a Nexus producer
to the [Korea
Times](http://www.koreatimes.co.kr/www/news/tech/2015/08/133_184309.html) – LG
is reportedly building the 5.2in Nexus 5.

We’ve yet to receive official confirmation from either Google or Huawei
regarding a Nexus 6 just yet. Stay tuned.
